i18n.title: React usePersistedState Hook
i18n.description: In this lab, we will learn about the usePersistedState hook in React, which allows us to persist a stateful value in localStorage. We will explore how to initialize and update the stored value, as well as how to handle changes to the key name. By the end of this lab, you will be able to use this hook in your React applications to ensure that certain data is stored and can be retrieved even after a page refresh.

meta.title: Mastering React's usePersistedState Hook
meta.description: Learn how to use the powerful usePersistedState hook to persist state in your React applications and ensure data is retained even after page refreshes.
meta.keywords: localstorage, usepersistedstate, react, state management, data persistence
